channel.title: KOM on PLA Cycling Log
channel.description: Recent content in KOM on PLA Cycling Log

item.title: King of the Mountain
item.description: Snagged the Red Bay Rd KOM with the help of a strong tailwind. So nice to see the sun again. Looking forward to tomorrow. More sun, less wind, and more miles. Strava KOM Android Screenshot Bicycle - Ashley River - Herbert H Jessen Public Boat Landing Sawmill Branch Canal Trail washed out Ashley River - Herbert H Jessen Public Boat Landing
